Ngakho-ke, ababambe iqhaza elikhulu futhi abaphumelela kakhulu empini kwaba "AmaJalimane namaNgisi" ngoba amaNgisi (i-British) abekade ephumelela ngokuthola usizo lukaMelika, futhi amaJalimane ayebambe iqhaza kodwa hhayi ukuphumelela okukhulu njengoba bephazanyiswa. Kodwa-ke, ngokombhalo, amaMelika nabakwaNgisi basiza impi futhi babonakala bephumelela kunamaJalimane abephazamisayo.

Kodwa uma siqaphela kahle, umbuzo uthi "ubani owaphumelela kangcono" empini yaseNyakatho Atlantic Campaign. Lapha amaMelika nabakwaNgisi basebenza ndawonye, kanti amaJalimane ayebuka umphikisi. Ngakho-ke ophumelela kangcono ngempela emkhankasweni yiqembu elaliphazamisa impumelelo yamaJalimane; lowo kungenxa yeqembu lawo lifuna ukuvimbela ukuhamba kwezimpahla. Ngakho ke, amaMelika namaNgisi, okuyiqembu elifaka amaMelika nabakwaNgisi, babenempumelelo ngokusebenzisa imikhumbi yabo ukuze balwele impi.

Ngakho impendulo elungile ibonakala kuyona ethi "Amangisi namaMelika," lokhu kusekelwe kulokho okushiwo esigabeni sokuthi amaMelika ayesiza iBhrithani ngokuthutha impahla nabasebenzi, okwenza impi iphumelele kubo.

question: Ngokwale ndaba, iyiphi indawo ethule ukuze ujabulele usuku ebhishi?
reasoning:
Indawo ethule ukujabulela usuku ebhishi kumele kube indawo enezindawo ezinokuthula nezishisekayo, ngokusho kwendaba izinhloso zisho ukuthi amabhishi aseNyakatho anesihlabathi esinokuphepha nokugcwele imithunzi yezihlahla, okusho ukuthula nenjabulo usuku lonke. Kodwa-ke, izindawo zase-Tamaki Drive eWaitemata Harbour, ezifana neMission Bay neSt Heliers, "zaba nabantu abaningi ngezinye izikhathi," okusho ukuthi azithuli kakhulu. Ngakho-ke, indawo ethule ukuyojabulela usuku ebhishi ibhekisela engxenyeni yesifunda saseNyakatho. Kodwa-ke, "North Harbor District" ayisho ngqo futhi ayichazwanga njengendawo ethulile okwamanje.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo engcono kakhulu ezenzakalweni lapho kunesidingo sokuthula is "EMission Bay" noma "ESt Heliers" ezihlala zinabantu abaningi ngezikhathi ezithile, kodwa phakathi kwalezi zimbili, iMission Bay ichazwa kakhulu njengeyindawo enedolobha labadla izambane likapondo (okungasho indawo enamandla okwenza izinto) kodwa akukho ukuthi yathula. Ngokuphambene, iNorth Harbor District akuchazwanga njengendawo yokujabulela usuku ebhishi. Ngakho-ke, impendulo ezokusho indawo ethule ukuyojabulela usuku ebhishi ngokolwazi olwethuliwe ayikho phakathi kwezinketho ngokusobala. Kodwa-ke, njengoba umbuzo ufuna indawo ethule, futhi iMission Bay neSt Heliers "zaba nabantu abaningi ngezinye izikhathi," impendulo engaba eduze kusho ukuthi iNorth Harbor District ayichazwanga njengesifunda esinezinkinga zabantu abaningi, okusho nokuthula.

Noma kunjalo, ngoba isiqephu sichaza ngokuthula okukhona ebhishi laseNyakatho ngenxa yesihlabathi esiphephile nezihlahla ze-pohutukawa, nesifunda iNorth Harbor singafakwa kule nkomba, lapho indawo ethule ibonakala ilapho. Ngakho impendulo engcono kakhulu iyona: "I-North Harbor District."

question: Amakati amancane athanda ukuzingela kuphi okulandelayo?
reasoning:
Isiqephu sikhuluma ngamakati amancane adla "izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo, izibankwa, kanye nezinyoni." Lawa bantu-bantu abancane abazingeli izilwane ezincane kakhulu, hhayi amagundwane noma abonogwaja noma inyamazane. Ngakho, impendulo efanele ibhekisela kulokho okudingekayo ukuthi amakati amancane athanda ukuzingela, okuyizilwane ezincane kakhulu ezifana nezinambuzane nendlela yokuzingela evuselelwe endimeni yabo, kodwa akubandakanyi amagundwane noma abonogwaja ngqo.

Noma kunjalo, uma sibheka ukukhetha phakathi kwezakhiwo ezikhona, isiqephu sisho "okusukela kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni" ukuthi amakati amancane adla inyama evela kuzo. Kodwa ekugcineni, amakati amancane adla izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, njll. Lokhu kusho ukuthi amakati amancane athanda ukuzingela izilwanyane ezincane kakhulu (ezizingelayo okuncane), hhayi amagundwane (amagundwane akhombisa izilwanyane ezincane, kepha umfuziselo wokudla kwawo awucacile), abonogwaja, noma inyamazane enkulu.

Isigaba esithi "ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ... edla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni" kubonisa ukuthi amakati amancane adla inyama evela kusukela kwenogwaja kuya kwenyamazane. Okulandelayo okutholakalayo emibuzweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bathanda ukuzingela izinja ezincane ezifana nezinyoni, izinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo kanye nezibankwa.
